testcase.name: Verify available products on inventory page
testcase.system-out:

testcase.name: Verify cart badge updates after adding items
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify cart badge updates after adding items Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 4.928s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.165s When User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.045s Then The cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.006s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify cart badge updates after removing items
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify cart badge updates after removing items Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.448s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.183s When User adds item 'bike light' to the cart ... passed in 1.041s And User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.045s And User removes item 'bike light' from the cart ... passed in 1.045s Then The cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.006s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
